helpdesk-ticket.subject: msoe login password
helpdesk-ticket.description: Hi, I am in the exchange program in Germany and I am locked out of my account. Would you be able to reset it for me please? Then could you email me at chaserigsby@gmail.com, since I am locked out of outlook also.
helpdesk-ticket.description-html: Hi, I am in the exchange program in Germany and I am locked out of my account. Would you be able to reset it for me please? Then could you email me at chaserigsby@gmail.com, since I am locked out of outlook also.

helpdesk-note.body:
Hi Chase,
Your password has been reset back to the default since it was expired.
Your default password is "Msoe######MMDDYY" where ###### is your 6 digit ID number and MMDDYY is your date of birth with 2 digits for each (last 2 for year).
If you have not yet registered for the MSOE password reset portal, go to pwdreg.msoe.edu and complete the registration process prior to changing your password.
Log on to the MSOE password reset portal at pwd.msoe.edu and reset your password using the security questions previously provided.
Your new password must meet the following criteria:
Passwords must be at least 8 characters Passwords must include at least 3 out of these 4 items:
Uppercase letter Lowercase letter A number A symbol
Note: The previous four passwords are remembered by the system, so you will need to use a unique password each time your password changes.
Please contact the Help Desk if you have any questions or problems resetting your password.
No MSOE employees nor any MSOE correspondence will ever ask you for your account password.​
Thank you, The MSOE Help Desk (414) 277-7288 o���'
helpdesk-note.body-html:
Hi Chase,

Your password has been reset back to the default since it was expired.

Your default password is "Msoe######MMDDYY" where ###### is your 6 digit ID number and MMDDYY is your date of birth with 2 digits for each (last 2 for year).


If you have not yet registered for the MSOE password reset portal, go to pwdreg.msoe.edu and complete the registration process prior to changing your password.

Log on to the MSOE password reset portal at pwd.msoe.edu and reset your password using the security questions previously provided.

Your new password must meet the following criteria:
  • Passwords must be at least 8 characters
  • Passwords must include at least 3 out of these 4 items:
    • Uppercase letter
    • Lowercase letter
    • A number
    • A symbol
Note: The previous four passwords are remembered by the system, so you will need to use a unique password each time your password changes.

Please contact the Help Desk if you have any questions or problems resetting your password.

No MSOE employees nor any MSOE correspondence will ever ask you for your account password.​

Thank you,
The MSOE Help Desk
(414) 277-7288

helpdesk-note.body: His password should be whatever he last set it to
helpdesk-note.body-html: His password should be whatever he last set it to

helpdesk-note.body:
Hi Chase Rigsby, Issue: http://helpdesk.msoe.edu/helpdesk/tickets/7519
I am showing that your account password has expired. This means that your password is over 90 days old. I am able to reset your password to the MSOE default if you provide us with your ID number or come to the desk with a valid student ID. The MSOE default password is: Msoe######MMDDYY The # symbolize your student ID number. The date is your birthday. Once you provide one of the two identifiers I will reset it for you.
James Windorff Helpdesk Technician helpdesk@msoe.edu 414 277 7288
helpdesk-note.body-html:
Hi Chase Rigsby,

Issue: http://helpdesk.msoe.edu/helpdesk/tickets/7519

I am showing that your account password has expired. This means that your password is over 90 days old. 
I am able to reset your password to the MSOE default if you provide us with your ID number or come to the desk with a valid student ID.
The MSOE default password is: Msoe######MMDDYY
The # symbolize your student ID number. The date is your birthday. Once you provide one of the two identifiers I will reset it for you.



James Windorff
Helpdesk Technician
helpdesk@msoe.edu
414 277 7288

helpdesk-note.body: called the user. went right to voicemail. The phone number is from the DB

helpdesk-note.body:
Hi Chase Rigsby, Issue: http://helpdesk.msoe.edu/helpdesk/tickets/4798
We are happy to help you with this issue, can you please provide your ID number as a verification so that we can reset your password to the default? The default being Msoe######MMDYY , the # is your 6 digit ID number followed your date of birth in the order of 2 digits of your month of birth,2 digits of your date of birth and last 2 digits of the year of birth, but please do verify your ID number so that we can set your password to this default password. Have a great day!
Thanks,
Shravanthi Bangalore Helpdesk Technician 414.277.7288 helpdesk@msoe.edu
